1555.verse: فَلَمَّا|So when|77|84|141$جَآءَ|came|57|71|4023$أَمْرُنَا|Our Command,|116|130|8101$جَعَلْنَا|We made|81|95|1137$عَـٰلِيَهَا|its upside,|88|102|8664$سَافِلَهَا|its downside,|107|121|8665$وَأَمْطَرْنَا|and We rained|115|122|6582$عَلَيْهَا|upon them|90|123|1269$حِجَارَةً|stones|86|152|7241$مِّن|of|50|116|53$سِجِّيلٍ|baked clay|91|157|8666$مَّنضُودٍ|(in) layers.|93|126|8667$

1558.verse: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ|And O my people!|137|149|8445$أَوْفُواْ|Give full|72|97|4703$ٱلْمِكْيَالَ|measure,|94|119|8671$وَٱلْمِيزَانَ|and weight|109|134|6182$بِٱلْقِسْطِ‌ۖ|in justice|86|111|2700$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|116|25$تَبْخَسُواْ|deprive|91|107|6587$ٱلنَّاسَ|the people|90|122|446$أَشْيَآءَهُمْ|(of) their things,|130|162|6588$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|136|25$تَعْثَوْاْ|act wickedly|103|135|580$فِى|in|48|64|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|304|100$مُفْسِدِينَ|spreading corruption.|160|372|581$

1560.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|99|101$يَـٰشُعَيْبُ|"O Shuaib!|96|115|6599$أَصَلَوٲتُكَ|Does your prayer|133|152|8674$تَأْمُرُكَ|command you|111|130|8675$أَن|that|48|67|655$نَّتْرُكَ|we leave|79|98|8676$مَا|what|53|63|262$يَعْبُدُ|worship|70|80|6520$ءَابَآؤُنَآ|our forefathers,|124|144|6154$أَوْ|or|41|61|154$أَن|that|48|68|655$نَّفْعَلَ|we do|65|85|8677$فِىٓ|concerning|92|112|89$أَمْوَٲلِنَا|our wealth|90|110|8678$مَا|what|53|63|262$نَشَـٰٓؤُاْ‌ۖ|we will?|73|88|8679$إِنَّكَ|Indeed you,|99|129|340$لَأَنتَ|surely you|88|118|8680$ٱلْحَلِيمُ|(are) the forbearing,|156|186|8681$ٱلرَّشِيدُ|the right-minded."|140|155|8682$

1561.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|80|309$يَـٰقَوْمِ|"O my people!|112|126|513$أَرَءَيْتُمْ|Do you see|94|108|5597$إِن|if|44|58|225$كُنتُ|I am|64|78|4182$عَلَىٰ|on|63|77|52$بَيِّنَةٍ|a clear evidence|129|143|5648$مِّن|from|50|57|53$رَّبِّى|my Lord,|77|86|2902$وَرَزَقَنِى|and He has provided me|179|197|8683$مِنْهُ|from Himself|100|118|571$رِزْقًا حَسَنًا‌ۚ|a good provision?|135|153|8684$وَمَآ|And not|72|90|46$أُرِيدُ|I intend|71|80|4900$أَنْ|that|48|54|655$أُخَالِفَكُمْ|I differ from you|127|140|8685$إِلَىٰ|in|53|66|118$مَآ|what|53|66|262$أَنْهَـٰكُمْ|I forbid you|96|108|8686$عَنْهُ‌ۚ|from it.|68|80|3938$إِنْ|Not|44|56|225$أُرِيدُ|I intend|71|84|4900$إِلَّا|except|65|71|86$ٱلْإِصْلَـٰحَ|the reform|99|110|8687$مَا ٱسْتَطَعْتُ‌ۚ|as much as I am able.|166|188|8688$وَمَا|And not|72|94|46$تَوْفِيقِىٓ|(is) my success|124|146|8689$إِلَّا|except|65|87|86$بِٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|with Allah.|89|100|79$عَلَيْهِ|Upon Him|81|140|395$تَوَكَّلْتُ|I trust|85|202|8005$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Him|91|208|2165$أُنِيبُ|I turn.|66|125|8690$

1555.verse: So when Our command came, We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of layered hard clay, [which were]

1556.verse: Marked from your Lord. And Allah 's punishment is not from the wrongdoers [very] far.

1557.verse: And to Madyan [We sent] their brother Shu'ayb. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. And do not decrease from the measure and the scale. Indeed, I see you in prosperity, but indeed, I fear for you the punishment of an all-encompassing Day.

1558.verse: And O my people, give full measure and weight in justice and do not deprive the people of their due and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption.

1559.verse: What remains [lawful] from Allah is best for you, if you would be believers. But I am not a guardian over you."

1560.verse: They said, "O Shu'ayb, does your prayer command you that we should leave what our fathers worship or not do with our wealth what we please? Indeed, you are the forbearing, the discerning!"

1561.verse: He said, "O my people, have you considered: if I am upon clear evidence from my Lord and He has provided me with a good provision from Him...? And I do not intend to differ from you in that which I have forbidden you; I only intend reform as much as I am able. And my success is not but through Allah. Upon him I have relied, and to Him I return.
